sentences.en: Early warnings of rising water levels prevented another major catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 提前发出的洪水水位上涨警报防止了又一次的重大灾害。

sentences.en: Even the smallest amount of wrong substances could cause complete catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 即使是极微量的有害物质,也会造成极大的灾难.

sentences.en: Every one feels that a disaster is imminent, as if a catastrophe is about to come.
sentences.cn: 谁都感到大事不好, 似乎有什么极大的灾难即将来临.

sentences.en: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 不管从哪方面说，战争都将是场灾难。

sentences.en: I owe it to you that I survived the catastrophe.
It was an absurd arrangement, and bound to lead to catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 这是一种荒唐的安排, 注定会导致灾难.

sentences.en: Major Major floundered bewilderedly from one embarrassing catastrophe to another.
sentences.cn: 梅杰少校当上中队长后稀里糊涂地碰上了一件又一件尴尬倒楣的事.

sentences.en: Now the whole town was talking about the catastrophe in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 现在是满街都在议论上海的战事了.

sentences.en: Only miserable creatures would survive such a catastrophe anyhow.
sentences.cn: 只有摇尾乞怜的家伙,才会经过这场灭顶之灾后幸存下来.

sentences.en: The flood was a major catastrophe.
Their English party turned out to be a catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 他们的英语晚会结局糟透了.

sentences.en: They suffered an electoral catastrophe, winning a paltry 3 seats.
sentences.cn: 他们在选举中惨败，仅获得微不足道的3个席位。

sentences.en: This is a catastrophe beyond human control.
sentences.cn: 这是一场人类无法控制的灾难.

sentences.en: Until he saw the trapped wagons and animals, he did not realize the full extent of the catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 直到他看见受困的马车和动物，才意识到灾难的严重性。

sentences.en: We live in the shadow of the apocalypse, of a catastrophe that will mean the end of the world itself.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在意味着世界末日将要到来的灾难的阴影当中。

trans.tran_en: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death
